bill.title: Relating To Economic Development.
bill.description: Establishes a Kapolei jobs initiative pilot program that offers incentives to increase the number of businesses willing to establish themselves or open a new location in the Kapolei region. Establishes a tax credit, until 12/31/2022, as part of the Kapolei jobs initiative pilot program. Takes effect 1/7/2059. (SD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Pass First Reading
Referred to EDB, FIN, referral sheet 4
Bill scheduled to be heard by EDB on Friday, 02-10-17 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on EDB recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Keohokalole, Holt, Johanson, Takumi, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from EDB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 426), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Holt, Souki excused (3).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-22-17 2:00PM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Cachola, DeCoite, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, Nakamura, Tokioka, Quinlan, Yamashita, Tupola, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Choy.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 767), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 49).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-13-17 9:30AM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 03-21-17 9:30AM in conference room 016.
Re-Referred to JDL, WAM/ETT.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, K. Rhoads, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Kim, L. Thielen ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1091) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM/ETT.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM/ETT.
The committee(s) on WAM/ETT will hold a public decision making on 04-03-17 1:30PM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Dela Cruz, English, Harimoto, K. Kahele, Shimabukuro, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Taniguchi ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria, Inouye, Riviere.

The committee(s) on ETT recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in ETT were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Wakai, Baker, Galuteria; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Taniguchi, L. Thielen ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM/ETT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1563) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-11-17.

Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Harimoto, Kim, K. Rhoads, Taniguchi, L. Thielen, Wakai . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 622) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
House Conferees Appointed: Nakashima, Cullen Co-Chairs; Ward.
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 585).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 586).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Keith-Agaran Chair; English, Wakai Co-Chairs; Gabbard, Shimabukuro.
